document.full_text: a state-appointed committee concluded on tuesday that egyptian police used excessive force against pro-democracy protesters in a damning report on their conduct during the unrest that toppled president hosni mubarak.
document.title: egypt used excessive force to quell protests: report
lines_and_colors: a state-appointed committee concluded on tuesday that egyptian police used excessive force against pro-democracy protesters in a damning report on their conduct during the unrest that toppled president hosni mubarak.
